attributes.action: Revise the Data Protection Act to allow Next of Kin to be able to find out about "Next of Kin"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When a son or daughter is arrested their parents are not allowed to see them or find out anything about the situation.
This petition requests that "Next of Kin"  or in simple English "Mums & Dads, Brothers & sisters" are allowed to find out whats going on with their relatives.
To not have any idea is so stressful. What about the human rights of the immediate family. This is becoming more like the regimes of eastern Europe of the last 50 years every day.
